articles.description: The announcement came just a few days after popular video conferencing platform Zoom announced a temporary lift of the 40-minute meeting limit on November 26 (Thanksgiving Day) for all users.

articles.title: Vivo V20 Pro Tipped to Cost Rs 29,990 in India, Other Sale Offers Leaked Ahead of Official Launch - News18
articles.description: The Vivo V20 Pro carries dual selfie cameras and is powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 765G SoC. Currently, the Vivo V20 and Vivo V20 SE are available to purchase in India.
